entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Westlock
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
